item.title: Open CSV Files
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Open CSV Files || Open CSV Files Comma Separated Values (CSV) files contain records whose values are delimited or separated by commas. You may use Microsoft Excel to save you spreadsheet in CSV format. To open CSV files, use the LoadOptions class, and select the CSV value, predefined in the FileFormatType enumeration. The following code snippet demonstrates opening CSV file with Aspose.
